column1: Kata Robata////Sushi - So here's the deal
column2: their rolls are alright. While we were waiting they were passing out free rolls to try and the two we tried were not that impressive
column3: BUT when we sat down we ordered some nigiri and everything about that was fresh
column4: perfectly sliced and delicious. Honestly I know I'm down playing this a little but seriously the sushi here is delicious and is played beautifully. You go here for the sushi first! That being said!! (like my segway...)
